response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe will significantly enhance the value and functionality of your operations. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, the product is valued at $1,000,000 by many, including yourself. Considering this, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire it at an exclusive price of $950,000. This represents a substantial saving compared to the market value, making it an attractive proposition for you. I trust that you will find this offer compelling and look forward to discussing how we can facilitate this transaction. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out.", "product_price": 950000}
